entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow near the Rockies. Clearing before morning. Amount 4 cm near the Rockies. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
